description.value:
You attempt to enthrall a foe with a convoluted and utterly pointless monologue that leaves your audience dumbfounded. Attempt a @Check[deception|against:will|options:inflicts:stupefied,inflicts:stunned] or @Check[diplomacy|against:will|options:inflicts:stupefied,inflicts:stunned] check against the Will DC of a single creature within 30 feet. The target is then temporarily immune to your Confounding Disquisition for 1 day.

Critical Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1} and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Success The target is stupefied 1 for 1 round.

Failure The target takes a â€“1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Confounding Disquisition (Failure)]{Effect: Confounding Disquisition (Failure)}

Critical Failure The target is unaffected.
